titles.title: A resolution commending Ronald L. Tammen for his service to the U.S. Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/19/1988--Introduced. Commends Ronald L. Tammen for his service to his country, the State of Wisconsin, and the Senate. (Ronald Tammen served as Administrative Assistant to Senator William Proxmire of Wisconsin.)
